title: Ghost Post
description: Schema for a Ghost post object in the post context

id.description: The Object ID of the post

comment_id.description: The old, pre-1.0 incremental id of a post if present, or else the new Object ID

title.description: The title of your site post

slug.description: Slugified version of the title (used in urls and also useful for class names)

excerpt.description: A short preview of your post content

url.description: The web address for the post page (calculated based on permalink settings)

feature_image.description: The cover image associated with the post

feature_image_alt.description: Alt text for the cover image associated with the post

feature_image_caption.description: Caption for the cover image associated with the post (supports basic html)

page.description: True if the post is a page

meta_title.description: Custom meta title for the post

meta_description.description: Custom meta description for the post

published_at.description: Date and time when the post was published

updated_at.description: Date and time when the post was last updated

created_at.description: Date and time when the post was created

primary_author.description: A formatted link to the first author

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the post

primary_tag.description: Direct reference to the first tag associated with the post
